alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 7:31PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very strong winds along with steady snowfall could produce areas of significantly reduced visibility at times this evening and overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys
